article.title: BAE to Provide V-22 Defensive Weapons Systems Mission Kits
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems Controls Incorporated, Johnson City, New York, is being awarded a more than $12 million modification to a previously awarded contract to procure 12 interim defensive weapons systems mission kits to support the V-22 tiltrotor aircraft. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
